item.description:
The Humanist Association of Connecticut's monthly meeting for June will feature a panel discussion on "Is Islam Compatible with Western Democracy?" The panelists will be Dr. David Schafer, author of a series of articles in the Humanist on Islam, and Michelle Koth, presenter of "Women and Islam" at one of our prior monthly meetings.

We'll start with coffee and conversation at 7:30 PM. The discussion will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.name: Is Islam Compatible with Western Democracy?
